description:
The classic Schwalbe touring tire, the Marathon is ready to roll out for your next adventure. Known for their smooth ride and excellent grip, the Marathon is trusted by cycle tourers all over the world. The custom engineered tread pattern has a smooth center line for speed, and increasingly aggressive lugs radiating up the sidewall for improve handling.

  • Addix rubber compound balances grip, durability and speed
  • 3mm GreenGuard for puncture resistance
  • Anti-aging sidewall improves longevity when out in the elements
  • Maximum load of 118kg
  • e-Bike compatible up to 50kph
name: Schwalbe Marathon 26 x 2.0in. GreenGuard Wire Tire
